game.name: Among Us
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 4~15명의 플레이어가 즐기는 온라인 및 로컬 파티 게임입니다. 우주에서 서로 협력하거나... 배신하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

reviewHighlights.text: As crazy as it may sound, this game stopped me from bed-rotting during the pandemic. My father had just passed away and getting out of bed became an e...
